statusmsg.welcome: Welcome to the $domain booking bot. Let me know, how can I help you?
statusmsg.usergoal:
SaveGoal:
Begin your interaction with the bot by exactly stating the below mentioned goal:
Goal:
$goal

Follow-up with the bot to achieve the goal.
statusmsg.no_booking: The game has started. You are the first player.
statusmsg.no_slots: The game has ended. Thank you for playing.
statusmsg.no_key_match: none of the keys are matched
statusmsg.partial_key_match: only some of the keys are matched
statusmsg.no_value_match: keys are matched but none of the values are matched
statusmsg.partial_value_match: for some keys, values are matched
statusmsg.dbfetch: in fetching the data from the database.
statusmsg.invalid_value: The value(s) for $slot are not matching with the booking system.
statusmsg.nocolumnmatch: No matching columns found in the database.
statusmsg.novaluematch: No matching data found in the database for the given query.

oneOf.description: Details for follow-up/acknowledgement, if the status is 'follow-up'.
